title: Tech Inc has never witnessed such a high. But is it ready for the new twist? - Economic Times
content: Tech Inc has never witnessed such a high. But is it ready for the new twist?  Economic Times
description: This sector has resurrected itself as a bellwether, demonstrating great resilience during the pandemic. The markets have been swift to take notice of the industry's ability to bounce back, rewarding it with larger capital allocation and higher trading multiples. With great recognition comes great responsibility. And therein lies the twist.
